meanings.definition: Covered in or full of thistles
meanings.sent1: The thistlier bush scratched my arm.
meanings.sent2: The field was thistlier than the garden.
meanings.sent3: The thistlier path made the hikers cautious.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as thistlier as the prickly thorns.
meanings.sent5: The thistlier plants in the meadow stood out sharply.

meanings.definition: Having more thistles than something else
meanings.sent1: The thistlier jacket had more thistles than the other.
meanings.sent2: His thistlier gloves protected his hands better.
meanings.sent3: The thistlier hat made him look like a walking thistle.
meanings.sent4: The competition grew thistlier as more thistles appeared.
meanings.sent5: The thistlier side of the fence was a prickly sight.
